facialInjectableServices.beforeAfterServiceDescription: View our transformative Botox results at Lushful Aesthetics, our expert treatments ensure a natural, refreshed appearance without the undesired frozen look. Our before and after Botox video showcases the significant yet subtle rejuvenation of the treatment. Whether it's your first visit or a follow-up for touch-ups, our personalized assessment ensures you receive the precise units needed for your desired outcome. At Lushful Aesthetics, we prioritize a look that enhances your natural features. We offer an individualized approach to prevent and treat fine lines and wrinkles, ensuring your satisfaction every time you look in the mirror.

intro.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"At Lushful Aesthetics, we specialize in two transformative methods of neck botox or NeckTox. The first version of NeckTox addresses the overall skin presentation of the neck, providing a solution for neck wrinkles and a crepey neck. The second method of NeckTox addresses the platysmal bands that are often associated with thinner aging patients. Our tailored approach makes us a top aesthetic clinic for men seeking neck rejuvenation.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

ourApproach.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Our Botox neck lift procedure involves micro-dosing Botox across the neck's surface.  This treatment aims to reduce turkey neck, smooth fine lines, and curb excessive sweating. For Platysmal bands Botox, toxin is injected directly into the bands to relax them so they no longer protrude when the patient animates their face and strains their neck. This can often give the patient’s lower face a more “lifted” appearance, as the platysma bands tend to pull the face down as we age. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

ourApproach.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Jawline filler is one of Lushful Aesthetics' most popular procedures and is one of the more common aesthetic clinic services, focusing on creating more of a chiseled jawline. This is done with a nonsurgical jawline contouring procedure utilizing Radiesse®, which lasts 3 years. Smaller amounts can be used, but patients are advised that they will likely only see a minimal improvement in jawline structure. Our jawline filler procedure often includes the chin to maintain facial harmonization. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

facialInjectableServices.subheadingTwo: What is the Safest Filler Technique for Nasolabial Lines?

ourApproach.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"At Lushful Aesthetics we address nasolabial folds utilizing filler with ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/17763611/#:~:text=The%20purpose%20of%20the%20Fern,deepen%20with%20expressive%20facial%20movements."},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"value":"the fern technique","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":". This technique is designed to inject filler very superficially into the dermis to strengthen the tissue and prevent filler migration. Research has shown that filler injected too deep in this region leads to more migration due to the degree of dynamic movement in the perioral region. By injecting superficially we are able to airbrush these lines for a softer look without worrying about filler migration after our treatment for nasolabial folds. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

Facial balancing aka facial harmonization serves as a nonsurgical refresher, aiming to uplift and brighten your overall appearance. Facial harmonization can give you a more symmetrical face and help you to look younger which can give people the boost in confidence in their appearance they need. Full facial balancing is used to address the entire face including areas like:","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Forehead","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Temples","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Under Eyes","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Cheeks","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Jawline","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Chin","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

facialInjectableServices.subheadingTwo: How Do Face Balancing Fillers Work?

ourApproach.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Facial balancing with fillers at an aesthetic clinic typically requires 3-5 syringes of hyaluronic acid-based and/or Radiesse®, ensuring a symmetrical effect across your face. Contrary to what one might think, this isn't an excessive amount. When a patient wants to achieve a sculpted jawline alone, 5-7 syringes are typically utilized. So, when you think of facial balancing, consider it as a touch here and a touch there. Once settled, other people shouldn't detect any noticeable \"augmentation.\" This aesthetic clinic procedure is personalized for each individual.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

facialAestheticServices.subheadingTwo: How Do Chemical Face Peels at Lushful Aesthetics Work?

ourApproach.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"A chemical peel utilizes a solution of actives (mainly acids) to induce a controlled injury to the outermost layers of the skin. The body removes the damaged skin via “peeling,” and the new skin that is revealed underneath has improved texture and more even pigment. Facial chemical peels also work beautifully to improve acne/blemishes by increasing the cell turnover rate of the skin and may help to reduce acne scars. Depending on the concern being targeted, as well as the area being treated, multiple sessions may be required for optimal results if you want to utilize facial chemical peels for hyperpigmentation or dark spots. Patients of our men’s aesthetic clinic who receive this service are provided with medical-grade skincare to optimize and maintain their results.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

facialAestheticServices.subheadingTwo: How Do Reve Enlighten Face Peels at Lushful Aesthetics Work?

ourApproach.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The Reve Enlighten Chemical Peel system utilizes a solution of actives (mainly acids) to induce a controlled injury to the outermost layers of the skin. The body removes the damaged skin via “peeling,” and the new skin that is revealed underneath has improved texture and more even pigment. Reve Enlighten chemical peels also work beautifully to improve acne/blemishes by increasing the cell turnover rate of the skin and may help to reduce acne scars. Depending on the concern being targeted, as well as the area being treated, multiple sessions may be required for optimal results if you want to utilize facial chemical peels for hyperpigmentation or dark spots. Patients of our men’s aesthetic clinic who receive this service are provided with medical-grade skincare for both before and after the chemical peel treatments to optimize and maintain their results.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

intro.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Pixel-8 Radiofrequency Microneedling, otherwise known as RF Microneedling, is a device that utilizes tiny needles to penetrate the stratum corneum and administer heat with bipolar radiofrequency energy. ourApproach.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"If you’re wondering how Pixel-8 microneedling with RF works, it utilizes tiny needles that deliver radiofrequency energy to contour and define a patient’s face by remodeling fat tissue strategically and helping to tighten skin. When addressing profile contouring and facial balancing optimization, Pixel-8 RF Microneedling is best utilized in conjunction with dermal fillers. Pixel-8 RF Microneedling also is one of the gold standards for treating acne scars, skin texture, improving the appearance of pores, and helping the appearance of cellulite. The aesthetic clinic results of the RF Microneedling procedure help to significantly improve skin texture. When targeting acne scars and skin texture, it’s best to initially combine Pixel-8 RF Microneedling with our signature laser facial to optimize skin rejuvenation. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

intro.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Alma TED (TransEpidermal Delivery) is a revolutionary, non-invasive hair growth aesthetic clinic treatment for hair loss, hair shedding, and hair thinning. The Alma TED hair treatment utilizes an ultrasound-based system that releases sound waves and air pressure to optimize the penetration of a powerful topical hair growth formula into the scalp. The benefits of this hair restoration machine vary from individual to individual: ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"No needles, anesthesia, or incisions","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Painless","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Thicker, healthier hair","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"No downtime or recovery ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Stronger hair follicles ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The hair restoration machine is designed to promote and increase blood flow, optimize scalp health, and stimulate hair follicles to produce thicker, stronger, and healthier hair. The topical formula utilized during the TED hair restoration procedure contains exponentially more peptides and growth factors than patient-derived PRP. Therefore the aesthetic clinic results experienced from the TED hair restoration device are far superior than PRP for hair restoration results.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

ourApproach.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"When the Alma TED hair restoration device is utilized in conjunction with the peptide and growth factor topical serum, it promotes increased blood flow to the scalp and delivers the peptides and growth factors directly to the hair follicle to promote healthier, thicker, and stronger head of hair during a hair regrowth treatment that takes about 15-20 minutes. The Alma TED hair restoration device delivers optimal results without the discomfort affiliated with PRP hair restoration which requires various injections that are quite painful. The ultrasound hair growth treatment is a completely painless and quick procedure.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

intro.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Anal bleaching is an aesthetic clinic treatment that works to lighten the color of the skin around the anus for aesthetic purposes. Intimate bleaching is becoming increasingly popular for those looking to achieve a more uniform skin tone in their most intimate areas, and can be utilized by both men and women patients at our aesthetic clinic.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

ourApproach.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Our intimate bleaching and chemical peels help suppress the action of melanocytes, thus lowering the amount of melanin produced (pigment). Melanocytes are the cells that make pigment throughout your body. We have the highest levels of these cells in the genital and anal regions. Pigmentation varies by person, but friction in the anal area and other environmental and hormonal factors can increase pigmentation. By utilizing a customized brightening cream in intimate areas, we can tailor your anal lightening experience to deliver optimal results that you will love. In addition, we provide those who receive our men's aesthetic clinic services with all the education on post-treatment care to know how to maintain your anal bleaching results at home over time.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

intro.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Botox can be used to treat hyperhidrosis (excessive sweating). Injecting into the underarm eccrine glands (sweat glands) helps to reduce or eliminate excessive underarm sweating caused by the medical condition axillary hyperhidrosis. It takes 2 weeks for the Botox to fully block the receptors in the sweat glands. Results last around 3-4 months, you can always return to our men’s aesthetic clinic in NYC to receive another round of treatment when you feel like it has worn off.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

ourApproach.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Aesthetic clinic patients looking for an easy solution to drastically reduce underarm sweating are great candidates for underarm Botox. Numbing is provided prior to the procedure and ProNox (laughing gas) is available if the patient would like further comfort. We utilize a multi-needle device to inject the Botox in the underarm area. The injection time for each underarm area is very quick, so patients do not need to worry about much discomfort. Please be advised that toxin prices listed are for Xeomin®; all other toxins will be charged at $14/unit.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

ourApproach.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"A body or buttocks chemical peel is a procedure that utilizes a solution of active ingredients (mainly acids) to induce a controlled injury to the outermost layers of the skin. Common areas for people to get chemical peels on their body include the back and butt. These areas are prone to acne related to hormones, hair growth, and sweat. Body chemical peels from an aesthetic clinic work beautifully to improve acne/blemishes by increasing the turnover rate of skin cells. Depending on the concern (such as treating sunspots, acne, hyperpigmentation, or acne scars) and the area being treated, multiple body chemical peel sessions may be required for optimal results. Do not wear makeup to your body chemical peel appointment. ​","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

bodyAestheticServices.subheadingTwo: Our Approach to a Non-Surgical BBL

ourApproach.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Like most dermal filler procedures, Lushful Aesthetic’s NYC-based liquid BBL procedure provides immediate non-surgical BBL results with the desired volume. At Lushful Aesthetics, a premier aesthetic clinic in NYC, we utilize hyperdilute Radiesse after an initial consultation to answer any questions about the instant BBL procedure and align on your goals for this procedure. Hyperdilute Radiesse for the buttocks is both a filler and a biostimulator, resulting in immediate volume and collagen stimulation. Radiesse® BBL treatments provide an immediate filling effect, creating natural-looking Brazilian Butt Lift results that last up to three years, while the collagen your body stimulates from the Radiesse can last over five years, resulting in a healthy lift to your buttocks.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

bodyAestheticServices.beforeAfterServiceDescription: Check out the remarkable transformations we’ve helped patients make in our non surgical BBL before and after video. Our Instant BBL procedure offers a significant butt lift providing an immediate increase in volume and a more defined profile without the need for surgery. The liquid butt lift before and after video demonstrates the benefits of a non surgical BBL, featuring a lifted appearance, overall size increase, and the smoothing out of asymmetries and cellulite. The before and after video also showcase how Lushful’s instant lift can be an alternative to hip dip filler with a seamless transition from butt to legs, ensuring a natural and enhanced silhouette.

intro.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Trap botox, or TrapTox for the trapezius muscle, is an aesthetic clinic treatment designed to release tightness and tension that often results in stiffness, recurring tension headaches, and tech neck. ourApproach.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"An aesthetic clinic’s Botox is injected into the trapezius to relax the muscle itself so it’s no longer able to contract as hard as it’s capable of during its natural state. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

These treatments are tailored for individuals seeking a more relaxed and aesthetically pleasing genital appearance. Our approach to genital Botox prioritizes natural-looking results and patient satisfaction, focusing on the relaxation of the cremaster muscle for HangTox® and the corpus cavernosum for ShowTox®, enhancing both comfort and aesthetics. To view our exclusive gallery of Scrotox before and after pictures, verification of age (18+) is required to access these images.
